name: College Sex - Episode 8
description:
A visual novel series about the sex lives of two college girls. In this episode, they meet with the assistant professor after hours to talk about an assignment.

GAME DESCRIPTION

“College Sex” is an erotic visual novel series that follows the story of two attractive young women and their naughty experiences in college.
Struggling with one of their assignments, Ivy and Jade meet after hours with Dr. Smith, an assistant professor at their college.
While he attempts to explain the requirements, the students’ minds begin to wonder about other things.
Ivy, a bit bolder than Jade, confesses that no one else is in the building at that hour, and it would be a shame for them not to take advantage of such an opportunity.
What follows next… we leave it to you to discover.
We promise you a steamy story with high-definition graphics and realistic-looking

FEATURES

- HD renders and animations
- Video and image gallery
